snippet: Barneys’ biggest bondholder, Perry Capital, announced on Monday that it had taken control of the retailer, concluding an effort to reorganize its finances after laboring under nearly $600 million in debt.
abstract: Barneys’ biggest bondholder, Perry Capital, announced on Monday that it had taken control of the retailer, concluding an effort to reorganize its finances after laboring under nearly $600 million in debt.

headline.main: Two Financiers Take Control of Barneys, Ending Its Debt Struggles
